text: Beatriz Souza (born 20 May 1998) is a Brazilian judoka. She won a medal at the 2019 World Judo Championships. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian female judoka Category:Judoka at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in judo Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Brazil
title: Beatriz Souza
